Riads.name: Riad Al Ksar
Riads.description: A luxurious riad with a rooftop terrace offering stunning views of the medina. Features traditional Moroccan decor and a tranquil courtyard garden.

Riads.name: Riad Fes Maya
Riads.description: An elegant riad in the heart of Fes, boasting intricate tile work and a serene atmosphere. Guests can enjoy a spa, hammam, and exquisite Moroccan cuisine.
Riads.address: Rue Sidi Mohamed Ben Amar, Fes

Riads.name: Riad Dar Anika
Riads.description: A charming riad located near the Bahia Palace. Offers a beautiful courtyard with a pool and a rooftop terrace where guests can relax and dine.

Riads.name: Riad Zitoune
Riads.description: A cozy riad in the old medina of Chefchaouen. Features traditional blue decor and a peaceful atmosphere, perfect for a relaxing getaway.

Riads.name: Riad La Maison Rouge
Riads.description: A stylish riad with modern amenities and a rooftop pool. Located in the vibrant city of Marrakech, close to major attractions and souks.
